checkInBook(Book, IBookController) - Method in class application.LibraryCore
Enforces check-in logic for Book objects, checks in Book objects if applicable, and instructs the database layer to update the provided book in the library database.
checkOutBook(Book, IBookController) - Method in class application.LibraryCore
Enforces check-out logic for Book objects, checks out Book objects if applicable, and instructs the database layer to update the provided book in the library database.
